<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Topple Giants](/Feats.aspx?ID=3121) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 51</row>

**Archetype** [Overwatch](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=109)

**Prerequisites**
[Overwatch Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3118)

</column>

---

When you observe an ally try and fail to execute a strategic maneuver against your enemies, you coordinate with your other allies to finish the job, using the opening from the first attempt to keep your foe off-balance and ensure your eventual success.

 When an ally within your overwatch field attempts to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41), [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38), or [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) an opponent within your overwatch field and fails, you coordinate efforts to provide a +2 circumstance bonus to the next [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check rolled by a different ally to attempt the same action on the same target before that target's next turn.
name: Topple Giants
